data.name: CarX Drift Racing Online - Gold
data.detailed_description:
Gold Edition CarX Drift Racing Online gives you an advantage over your competitors. Stand out the crowd, having been given unique customization capabilities, bonuses to your experience, 5 000 000 game currency at the start of the game.

The special Gold edition of CarX Drift Racing Online includes:


  • Unique special edition of Atlas GT available only in the Gold Edition
  • Unique special edition for Caravan G6 - Ghost Drifter
  • Increased rates for experience x2
  • Increased rates for money x2
  • 5,000,000 money as Start Bonus

Such cars as:


Ghost Drifter & Santa Truck - will be available to you without the presence of DLC if you purchased the game in the early access.

data.short_description: Gold Edition CarX Drift Racing Online gives you an advantage over your competitors. Stand out the crowd, having been given unique customization capabilities, bonuses to your experience, 5 000 000 game currency at the start of the game.
data.supported_languages: English, Russian, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese, Japanese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 4590 or AMD Ryzen3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB (GeForce 950GT / AMD R9 270)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound card compatible with DirectX® 9.0с
  • Additional Notes: The application’s stability is not guaranteed on Intel HD Graphics and AMD HD Radeon on-board graphics cards.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ I5-8300H @ 2.30GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 1050GTX 4 Gb
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound card compatible with DirectX® 9.0с
  • Additional Notes: The application’s stability is not guaranteed on Intel HD Graphics and AMD HD Radeon on-board graphics cards.
